statement.p: The diagram below shows a triangle inscribed in a rectangle.
What is the area of the shaded inscribed triangle? \displaystyle{u}{n}{i}{t}{s}^{{2}}
What is the area of the rectangle? \displaystyle{u}{n}{i}{t}{s}^{{2}}
How much more area does the rectangle have than the shaded triangle? \displaystyle{u}{n}{i}{t}{s}^{{2}}
What is the total area of the unshaded parts of the rectangle? \displaystyle{u}{n}{i}{t}{s}^{{2}}
